text: pasu va malavun keren nægituvanu labana dina ohu (allah) ovunva avamanayata lak karayi. tavada (visvasavantayin samaga mage yæyi) numbala tarka karamin siti evan mage havulkaruvan kohe dæyi vimasayi. niyata vasayenma ada dina nindava ha napura deva pratiksepakayin veta yæyi gnanaya denu læbuvan pavasati
